pages.text: $(item)Eyes of Ender/$ will locate $(structure)Ancient Cities/$ instead of $(structure)Strongholds/$

pages.title: Shulker Boxes
pages.text: $(entity)Shulkers/$ and $(item)Shulker Boxes/$ have been removed. However, $(link:patchouli:tools/sack)Sacks/$ can be used to fill the role of $(item)Shulker Boxes/$, albeit less powerful.
